TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContextMenu extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase

summary.span: 表示一个弹出菜单，该弹出菜单使控件能够公开特定于该控件的上下文的功能。

span.span: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象（如字符串、图像或面板）的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 类的属性用于定义 的位置和行为。The properties of the class are used to define the position and behavior of the . 或 可以具有 。A or can have a . 如果将 分配到 或 属性，则 类将处理上下文菜单操作，以响应用户交互。If you assign a to the or property, the class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction. 的一部分工作是当用户在控件上单击鼠标右键时打开 。Part of the work the does is opening the when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control. 以下属性由 和 类定义。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果在 和 上都设置了这些属性中的任何一个，则将使用 中的属性值。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 自动置于 控件中。A is automatically placed inside a control. 此行为不能更改。This behavior cannot be changed. ## 自定义 ContextMenu 控件Customizing the ContextMenu Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[ContextMenu 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个操作 的文本的 。The following example creates a that manipulates the text of a . 该示例演示如何订阅和处理 中 对象的事件。The example demonstrates how to subscribe to and handle the events of objects in a . [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#Events](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#events)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个回调，该回调指示 应放在屏幕上的什么位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a should be placed on the screen.

value.span: 一个指定 的位置的回调。

span.span: A callback that specifies the location of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为 才能使用回调委托。The property must be set to for the callback delegate to be used. 委托返回在 中定义的可能点的数组。The delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the . 显示上下文菜单时，将选择一个点来最大程度地增加可见的 窗口的数量。When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the window that is visible. 行为与弹出窗口的行为相同。The behavior is the same as it is for the popup. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：指定自定义 Popup 位置](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position)和[Popup 放置示例](https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs/tree/master/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS)。For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position) and [Popup Placement Sample](https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs/tree/master/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅[Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位 。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 这些属性的行为与 的属性相同。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. "属性值" 一节中提到的 范围限制相同。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm``pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **注意**在许多情况下，double 可以设置为 Auto，但如果偏移量设置为 Auto，则不会显示 。**Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性，使 在相对于其按钮父级的指定位置打开。The following example shows how to use the property to cause a to open at a specified location in relation to its button parent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 准备元素可能涉及应用样式、设置绑定等。Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: Get or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅[Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位 。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 这些属性的行为与 的属性相同。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable. "属性值" 一节中提到的 范围限制相同。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm``pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > 在许多情况下，double 可以设置为 Auto，但如果偏移设置为 Auto，则不会显示 。In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性，使 在相对于其按钮父级的指定位置打开。The following example shows how to use the property to cause a to open at a specified location in relation to its button parent. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#ContextMenuProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuprops)]
